verses.verse: As <S%H7950>snow<s%> in <S%H7019>summer,<s%> and as <S%H4306>rain<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5000>seemly<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>

As the <S%H6833>bird<s%> by <S%H5110>wandering,<s%> as the <S%H1866>swallow<s%> by <S%H5774>flying,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H7045>curse<s%> <S%H2600>causeless<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>come.<s%>
A <S%H7752>whip<s%> for the <S%H5483>horse,<s%> a <S%H4964>bridle<s%> for the <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and a <S%H7626>rod<s%> for the <S%H3684>fool's<s%> <S%H1460>back.<s%>
Answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> according to his <S%H200>folly,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> be <S%H7737>like<s%> unto him.
Answer <S%H6030><s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> according to his <S%H200>folly,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>conceit.<s%>
He that <S%H7971>sendeth<s%> a <S%H1697>message<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> cutteth <S%H7096>off<s%> the <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H8354>drinketh<s%> <S%H2555>damage.<s%>
The <S%H7785>legs<s%> of the <S%H4480>lame<s%> <S%H6455><s%> are not <S%H1809>equal:<s%> so is a <S%H4912>parable<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
As he that <S%H6887>bindeth<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> in a <S%H4773>sling,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> is he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%> to a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>
As a <S%H2336>thorn<s%> goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H7910>drunkard,<s%> so is a <S%H4912>parable<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
The <S%H7227>great<s%> God that <S%H2342>formed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things both <S%H7936>rewardeth<s%> the <S%H3684>fool,<s%> and <S%H7936>rewardeth<s%> <S%H5674>transgressors.<s%>
As a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H7725>returneth<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> his <S%H6892>vomit,<s%> so a <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H8138>returneth<s%> to his <S%H200>folly.<s%>
Seest <S%H7200><s%> thou a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>conceit?<s%> there is more <S%H8615>hope<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> than <S%H4480>of<s%> him.
The <S%H6102>slothful<s%> man <S%H559>saith,<s%> There is a <S%H7826>lion<s%> in the <S%H1870>way;<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> is <S%H996>in<s%> the <S%H7339>streets.<s%>
As the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H5437>turneth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H6735>hinges,<s%> so doth the <S%H6102>slothful<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H4296>bed.<s%>
The <S%H6102>slothful<s%> <S%H2934>hideth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in his <S%H6747>bosom;<s%> it <S%H3811>grieveth<s%> him to bring it <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> is <S%H2450>wiser<s%> in his own <S%H5869>conceit<s%> than <S%H4480>seven<s%> <S%H7651><s%> men that can <S%H7725>render<s%> a <S%H2940>reason.<s%>

He that passeth <S%H5674>by,<s%> and <S%H5674>meddleth<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H7379>strife<s%> belonging <S%H3808>not<s%> to him, is like one that <S%H2388>taketh<s%> a <S%H3611>dog<s%> by the <S%H241>ears.<s%>
As a <S%H3856>mad<s%> man who <S%H3384>casteth<s%> <S%H2131>firebrands,<s%> <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and <S%H4194>death,<s%>
So <S%H3651><s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7411>deceiveth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H559>saith,<s%> Am <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> in <S%H7832>sport?<s%>
Where <S%H657>no<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> is, there the <S%H784>fire<s%> goeth <S%H3518>out:<s%> so where there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5372>talebearer,<s%> the <S%H4066>strife<s%> <S%H8367>ceaseth.<s%>
As <S%H6352>coals<s%> are to burning <S%H1513>coals,<s%> and <S%H6086>wood<s%> to <S%H784>fire;<s%> so is a <S%H4079>contentious<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H2787>kindle<s%> <S%H7379>strife.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5372>talebearer<s%> are as <S%H3859>wounds,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the innermost <S%H2315>parts<s%> of the <S%H990>belly.<s%>
Burning <S%H1814><s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> and a <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> are like a <S%H2789>potsherd<s%> <S%H6823>covered<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H5509>dross.<s%>
He that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> <S%H5234>dissembleth<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and layeth <S%H7896>up<s%> <S%H4820>deceit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him;

When <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H6963>speaketh<s%> <S%H2603>fair,<s%> <S%H539>believe<s%> him <S%H408>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> there are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Whose <S%H8135>hatred<s%> is <S%H3680>covered<s%> by <S%H4860>deceit,<s%> his <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> shall be <S%H1540>showed<s%> before the whole <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>
Whoso <S%H3738>diggeth<s%> a <S%H7845>pit<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> therein: and he that <S%H1556>rolleth<s%> a <S%H68>stone,<s%> it will <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> him.
A <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H8130>hateth<s%> those that are <S%H1790>afflicted<s%> by it; and a <S%H2509>flattering<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H6213>worketh<s%> <S%H4072>ruin.<s%>
